entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
